New Records: Virat Kohli scored 95 runs, his 47th ODI half-century
Mohammed Shami took 5 wickets for 54 runs
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored 95 runs off 104 balls
Mohammed Shami took 5 wickets for 54 runs
Daryl Mitchell scored 130 runs off 127 balls
India won by 4 wickets with 12 balls remaining
Post-Match Reflections: Mohammed Shami was awarded the Player of the Match for his 5-wicket haul
India won 2 points and moved ahead in the series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Himachal Pradesh Cricket Association Stadium, Dharamsala
The toss was won by India, who elected to field first
